calendar_id: # calendar_id: Unique identifier for the calendar (lowercase-hyphenated)
# calendar_name: Display name of the calendar
# day_id: Unique identifier for the day (COUNTRY-MONTH-DAY or GLOBAL-MONTH-DAY)
# date: Full date in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g.
# event_name: Display name of the event/holiday
# event_description: Detailed description of the event
# primary_color: Hex color code for UI display (e.g.
# notes: Any additional notes or context
# INSTRUCTIONS FOR USING THIS CSV TEMPLATE
# 1. Each row represents a DAY linked to a CALENDAR
# 2. If the same day appears in multiple calendars
# 3. Use consistent calendar_id for all days in the same calendar
# 4. Dates must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
# 5. Tags and customs are pipe-separated (|) with NO SPACES
# 7. Leave blank fields empty (just use commas)
# 8. Do NOT include quotes around values unless they contain commas
